title: blockchainhub
author: blockchainhub
content: Blockchain is described as ?THE NEW INTERNET? and is driving Transition for businesses in Various fields, specifically financial services. Share your thoughts.

comments.author: palle11
comments.body: Sorry you don't expect someone to share a thought when you have not layed a guide properly for them to contribute. What you have said is almost the usual thing that is known. Learn how to create and build up your post so you can have robust contribution on it. I see you are a newbie
